g.phishy_message: Link expanded to plain text; beware of a potential phishing attempt
g.you_need_private_password_or_key_not_a_p: You need a private password or key (not a public key)

the_rules_of_APP_NAME.one: The first rule of %(APP_NAME)s is: Do not lose your password.
the_rules_of_APP_NAME.second: The second rule of %(APP_NAME)s is: Do not lose your password.
the_rules_of_APP_NAME.third: The third rule of %(APP_NAME)s is: We cannot recover your password.
the_rules_of_APP_NAME.fourth: The fourth rule: If you can remember the password, it's not secure.
the_rules_of_APP_NAME.fifth: The fifth rule: Use only randomly-generated passwords.
the_rules_of_APP_NAME.sixth: The sixth rule: Do not tell anyone your password.
the_rules_of_APP_NAME.seventh: The seventh rule: Always back up your password.

g.backup_password_by_storing_it: Back it up by storing in your password manager or a text file
g.enter_account_show_password: Enter a valid account name to show the password
g.understand_that_APP_NAME_cannot_recover_: I understand that %(APP_NAME)s cannot recover lost passwords
g.i_saved_password: I have securely saved my generated password
g.password_must_be_characters_or_more: Password must be %(amount)s characters or more
g.need_password_or_key: You need a private password or key (not a public key)
g.account_name_should_start_with_a_letter: Account name should start with a letter.
g.account_name_should_have_only_letters_di: Account name should have only letters, digits, periods or dashes.
g.cannot_increase_reward_of_post_within_th: Cannot increase reward of post within the last minute before payout
g.vote_currently_exists_user_must_be_indic: vote currently exists, user must be indicate a desire to reject witness
g.only_one_APP_NAME_account_allowed_per_ip: Only one Steem account allowed per IP address every 10 minutes
g.thank_you_for_being_an_early_visitor_to_: Thank you for being an early visitor to %(APP_NAME)s. We will get back to you at the earliest possible opportunity.
g.sorry_your_reddit_account_doesnt_have_en: Sorry, your Reddit account doesn't have enough Reddit Karma to qualify for a free sign up. Please add your email for a place on the waiting list
g.or_click_the_button_below_to_register_wi: Or click the button below to register with Facebook

next_7_strings_single_block.authors_get_paid_when_people_like_you_up: Authors get paid when people like you upvote their post
next_7_strings_single_block.if_you_enjoyed_what_you_read_earn_amount: If you enjoyed what you read here, create your account today and start earning FREE STEEM!

g.read_only_mode: Due to server maintenance we are running in read only mode. We are sorry for the inconvenience.

post_key_warning.confirm: You are about to publish a STEEM private key or master password. You will probably lose control of the associated account and all its funds.
post_key_warning.warning: Legitimate users, including employees of Steemit Inc., will never ask you for a private key or master password.

navigation.intro_paragraph: Your voice is worth something. Join the community that pays you to post and curate high quality content.

reply_editor.use_limited_amount_of_tags: You have %(tagsLength)s tags total%(includingCategory)s. Please use only 5 in your post and category line.
reply_editor.are_you_sure_you_want_to_clear_this_form: Are you sure you want to clear this form?
reply_editor.check_this_to_auto_upvote_your_post: Check this to auto-upvote your post
reply_editor.title: Title

category_selector_jsx.tag_your_story: Tag (up to 5 tags), the first tag is your main category.
category_selector_jsx.use_only_allowed_characters: Use only lowercase letters, digits and one dash
category_selector_jsx.must_end_with_a_letter_or_number: Must end with a letter or number

postfull_jsx.this_post_is_not_available_due_to_a_copy: This post is not available due to a copyright claim.
postfull_jsx.you_are_viewing_a_single_comments_thread: You are viewing a single comment's thread from

market_jsx.price_warning_above: This price is well above the current market price of %(marketPrice)s, are you sure?
market_jsx.price_warning_below: This price is well below the current market price of %(marketPrice)s, are you sure?

recoveraccountstep1_jsx.unable_to_recover_account_not_change_own: We are unable to recover this account, it has not changed ownership recently.
recoveraccountstep1_jsx.password_not_used_in_last_days: This password was not used on this account in the last 30 days.
recoveraccountstep1_jsx.request_already_submitted_contact_suppor: Your request has been already submitted and we are working on it. Please contact %(SUPPORT_EMAIL)s for the status of your request.
recoveraccountstep1_jsx.recover_account_intro: From time to time, a Steemian's owner key may be compromised. Stolen Account Recovery gives the rightful account owner 30 days to recover their account from the moment the thief changed their owner key. Stolen Account Recovery can only be used on %(APP_URL)s if the account owner had previously listed '%(APP_NAME)s' as their account trustee and complied with %(APP_NAME)s's Terms of Service.
recoveraccountstep1_jsx.login_with_facebook_or_reddit_media_to_v: Please login with Facebook or Reddit to verify your identity
recoveraccountstep1_jsx.login_with_social_media_to_verify_identi: Silahkan masuk dengan %(provider)s untuk memverifikasi identitas anda
recoveraccountstep1_jsx.enter_email_toverify_identity: Kami perlu untuk memverifikasi identitas anda. Silahkan masukkan alamat surel anda di bawah ini untuk memulai verifikasi.
recoveraccountstep1_jsx.thanks_for_submitting_request_for_accoun: Terima kasih telah mengirimkan permintaan Anda untuk pemulihan akun menggunakan %(APP_NAME)s' s blockchain-based multi faktor otentikasi. Kami akan merespon Anda secepat mungkin, namun harap dimaklumi akan kemungkinan adanya beberapa keterlambatan dalam merespon, karena banyaknya email yang masuk. Harap bersiaplah untuk memverifikasi identitas Anda.
recoveraccountstep1_jsx.cant_confirm_account_ownership: Kami tidak dapat mengkonfirmasi kepemilikan account. Harap periksa password Anda
recoveraccountstep1_jsx.account_recovery_request_not_confirmed: Permintaan pemulihan akun belum dikonfirmasi, harap kembali lagi nanti, terima kasih atas kesabaran Anda.

user_profile.user_hasnt_followed_anything_yet: Tampaknya %(name)s belum mengikuti siapa pun juga! Jika %(name)s baru saja menambahkan pengguna baru untuk diikuti, umpan pribadi mereka akan langsung terisi begitu konten baru tersedia.
user_profile.looks_like_you_havent_posted_anything_ye: Sepertinya Anda tidak pernah memposting apapun.
user_profile.this_is_users_reputations_score_it_is_ba: Ini adalah Nilai Reputasi %(name)s. Nilai Reputasi didasarkan pada sejarah suara yang diterima oleh suatu akun, dan digunakan untuk menyembunyikan konten berkualitas rendah.

post_jsx.now_showing_comments_with_low_ratings: Sedang menampilkan komentar dengan peringkat rendah

voting_jsx.flagging_post_can_remove_rewards_the_fla: Menandai sebuah posting bisa menghilangkan hadiah dan membuat materi ini kurang terlihat. Beberapa alasan umum untuk menandai
voting_jsx.intentional_miss_categorized_content_or_: Konten tanpa kategori yang disengaja atau Spam
voting_jsx.we_will_reset_curation_rewards_for_this_: akan mangatur ulang pendapatn kurasi untuk postingan ini

witnesses_jsx.if_you_want_to_vote_outside_of_top_enter: Jika Anda hendak memilih seorang saksi diluar dari daftar 50 teratas, silahkan masukkan nama akun yang bersangkutan ke kotak dibawah ini untuk memberikan suara
witnesses_jsx.set_witness_proxy: Anda juga bisa memilih proxy yang akan memilih saksi untuk Anda. Ini akan mengatur ulang pilihan saksi Anda saat ini.
witnesses_jsx.witness_set: Anda telah menetapkan voting proxy. Jika Anda ingin mengaktifkan ulang pemungutan suara manual, Mohon hapus proxy.

votesandcomments_jsx.no_responses_yet_click_to_respond: Belum ada tanggapan. Klik untuk merespon.

response_count_tooltip.zero: belum ada tanggapan. Klik untuk merespon.

userkeys_jsx.posting_key_is_required_it_should_be_dif: Kunci postingan digunakan untuk posting dan voting. Ini harus berbeda dari kunci aktif dan kunci pemilik.
userkeys_jsx.the_active_key_is_used_to_make_transfers: Kunci aktif digunakan untuk melakukan transfer dan memesan di pasar internal.
userkeys_jsx.the_owner_key_is_required_to_change_othe: Pemilik kunci adalah kunci master untuk akun dan diperlukan untuk mengubah kunci lain.
userkeys_jsx.the_private_key_or_password_should_be_ke: Kunci pribadi atau password untuk pemilik kunci harus disimpan offline sebanyak mungkin.
userkeys_jsx.the_memo_key_is_used_to_create_and_read_: Kunci memo digunakan untuk membuat dan membaca memo.

suggestpassword_jsx.APP_NAME_cannot_recover_passwords_keep_t: %(APP_NAME)s tidak dapat memulihkan password. Jauhkan Halaman ini di lokasi yang aman, seperti tahan api aman atau keselamatan kotak deposit.

converttosteem_jsx.your_existing_DEBT_TOKEN_are_liquid_and_: Yang ada %(DEBT_TOKEN)s semua liquid dan tidak dapat dipindahtangankan. Sebaliknya Anda mungkin ingin perdagangan %(DEBT_TOKEN)s langsung di situs ini di bawah %(link)s atau transfer ke pasar eksternal.
converttosteem_jsx.this_is_a_price_feed_conversion: Ini adalah harga konversi. Penundaan 3.5 hari ini diperlukan untuk mencegah penyalahgunaan dari permainan harga rata-rata
converttosteem_jsx.DEBT_TOKEN_will_be_unavailable: This action will take place 3.5 days from now and can not be canceled. These %(DEBT_TOKEN)s will immediately become unavailable

tips_js.liquid_token:
Tradeable tokens that may be transferred anywhere at anytime.
%(LIQUID_TOKEN)s can be converted to %(VESTING_TOKEN)s in a process called powering up.
tips_js.influence_token: Influence tokens which give you more control over post payouts and allow you to earn on curation rewards.
tips_js.estimated_value: The estimated value is based on an average value of %(LIQUID_TOKEN)s in US dollars.
tips_js.non_transferable: %(VESTING_TOKEN)s is non-transferable and requires 3 months (13 payments) to convert back to %(LIQUID_TOKEN)s.
tips_js.converted_VESTING_TOKEN_can_be_sent_to_y: Converted %(VESTING_TOKEN)s can be sent to yourself or someone else but can not transfer again without converting back to %(LIQUID_TOKEN)s.
tips_js.part_of_your_steem_power_is_currently_de: Part of %(user_name)s's STEEM POWER is currently delegated. Delegation is donated for influence or to help new users perform actions on steemit. Your delegation amount can fluctuate.

promote_post_jsx.spend_your_DEBT_TOKEN_to_advertise_this_: Spend your %(DEBT_TOKEN)s's to advertise this post in the promoted content section
promote_post_jsx.this_post_was_hidden_due_to_low_ratings: This post was hidden due to low ratings

about_jsx.about_app_details: %(APP_NAME)s is a social media platform where everyone gets paid for creating and curating content. It leverages a robust digital points system, called Steem, that supports real value for digital rewards through market price discovery and liquidity.

markdownviewer_jsx.images_were_hidden_due_to_low_ratings: Images were hidden due to low ratings.

posts_index.empty_feed_1: Looks like you haven't followed anything yet
posts_index.empty_feed_2: If you recently added new users to follow, your personalized feed will populate once new content is available
posts_index.empty_feed_5: Jelajahi Daftar Pertanyaan yang Sering Diajukan

loginform_jsx.you_need_a_private_password_or_key: Anda memerlukan sandi pribadi atau kunci (bukan kunci umum)
loginform_jsx.unable_to_log_you_in: Anda tidak bisa masuk dengan browser ini.
loginform_jsx.are_well_tested_and_known_to_work_with: telah diuji dengan baik dan diketahui bekerja dengan %(APP_URL)s.
loginform_jsx.due_to_server_maintenance: Kami berjalan dalam modus read-only karena sedang melakukan pemeliharaan server. Kami Mohon maaf atas ketidaknyamanannya.
loginform_jsx.this_password_is_bound_to_your_account_o: Kata sandi ini terikat pada kunci pemilik akun Anda dan tidak dapat digunakan untuk masuk ke situs ini.
loginform_jsx.to_obtain_a_more_secure_set_of_keys: untuk mendapatkan kunci yang lebih aman.
loginform_jsx.this_password_is_bound_to_your_account_a: Kata sandi ini terikat pada kunci aktif akun Anda dan tidak dapat digunakan untuk login ke halaman ini.
loginform_jsx.you_may_use_this_active_key_on_other_mor: Anda dapat menggunakan kunci aktif ini pada halaman lain yang lebih aman seperti halaman Dompet atau Pasar.
loginform_jsx.password_update_succes: Kata sandi untuk %(accountName)s sudah berhasil diperbarui
loginform_jsx.password_info: Sandi atau kunci pribadi yang dimasukkan salah.  Mungkin ada kesalahan tulisan tangan atau entri data.  Petunjuk: Sandi atau kunci pribadi yang dihasilkan oleh Steemit tidak pernah mengandung karakter 0 (nol), O (o besar), I (i besar) dan l (L kecil).
loginform_jsx.this_operation_requires_your_key_or_mast: This operation requires your %(authType)s key or Master password.

chainvalidation_js.have_only_letters_digits_or_dashes: have only letters, digits, or dashes.
chainvalidation_js.have_only_one_dash_in_a_row: have only one dash in a row.
chainvalidation_js.end_with_a_letter_or_digit: end with a letter or digit.
chainvalidation_js.verified_exchange_no_memo: You must include a memo for your exchange transfer.

transfer_jsx.balance_subject_to_3_day_withdraw_waitin: Balance subject to 3 day withdraw waiting period,
transfer_jsx.protect_funds_by_requiring_a_3_day_withd: Melindungi dana dengan mewajibkan 3 hari masa tunggu penarikan.
transfer_jsx.withdraw_funds_after_the_required_3_day_: Tarik dana setelah masa tunggu 3 hari yang dibutuhkan.
transfer_jsx.beware_of_spam_and_phishing_links: Waspadalah terhadap spam dan phishing link di transfer memo. Jangan buka link dari pengguna yang Anda tidak percaya. Jangan memberikan kunci pribadi Anda ke website pihak ketiga.

userwallet_jsx.tokens_worth_about_1_of_LIQUID_TICKER: Token bernilai sekitar $1,00 dari %(LIQUID_TICKER)s, saat ini sedang mengumpulkan %(sbdInterest)s%% APR.
userwallet_jsx.next_power_down_is_scheduled_to_happen: Menurunkan daya berikutnya dijadwalkan untuk terjadi

powerdown_jsx.already_power_down: Anda sudah melakukan power down %(AMOUNT)s %(LIQUID_TICKER)s (%(WITHDRAWN)s %(LIQUID_TICKER)s dibayarkan sejauh). Catatan bahwa jika Anda mengubah jumlah power down maka jadwal pembayaran akan diatur ulang.
powerdown_jsx.delegating: Anda mendelegasikan %(AMOUNT)s %(LIQUID_TICKER)s. Jumlah tersebut dikunci dan tidak tersedia untuk dilakukan power down hingga delegasi tersebut dihapus dan satu periode Penghargaan penuh telah terlampaui.
powerdown_jsx.warning: Tersisa kurang daripada %(AMOUNT)s %(VESTING_TOKEN)s dalam akun ini tidak dianjurkan dan dapat meninggalkan akun Anda dalam keadaan yang tidak dapat digunakan.

checkloginowner_jsx.if_you_did_not_make_this_change: Jika Anda tidak melakukan perubahan ini silahkan
checkloginowner_jsx.i_understand_dont_show_again: Saya mengerti, jangan tunjukkan saya lagi
